column1: Try these vegetable recipe ideas: - Stir-fried broccoli over brown rice - Collard greens with a fried egg - Roasted beets with fennel and orange slices - Corn and tomato salad - Grilled veggie kabobs or roasted vegetables - Store-bought low-sodium soups with added frozen veggies - Frozen vegetables stirred into boiling pasta during the last 5 minutes of cooking
Just be sure you buy beans that are low in salt (sodium).
Like nuts, oils are high in calories, so they are healthiest in smaller amounts.
